title: The rise of a Silicon Valley supervillain
description:
Peter Thiel has worn many hats over the years: He co-founded PayPal, helped fund Facebook, and brought about Gawker’s demise. He was also one of Donald Trump’s biggest advocates. How did Thiel gain so much power? Bloomberg’s Max Chafkin (@chafkin) explains.

References: 
Listen to Peter Kafka’s full interview with Max Chafkin here
